about_the_game:
When the city of Aphrokara sleeps, the forces that slumber beneath it will wake. Twisting the darkest and most perverse desires against humanity, these Aspects seek to change the world as we know it. The only one who can stand in their way is one nobody would have expected, Lisa.

In her daily life, Lisa is just an ordinary office worker. She files reports day in and day out with her work BFF Mimi. She takes jogs on the beach and spends time watching the latest movies. Her life is a simple one, if a bit uneventful. That all ends when the sun sets, however...

At night she delves into a secret time known as "Time Displacement" and takes up the mantle of the Lust Knight! Together with her magical mascot, Luvjak, she must explore four different domains over the course of four weeks. With each aspect bringing their own twisted traps and perversions, Lisa must endure a variety of kinky bondage, transformations, hypnosis, and good old-fashioned fucking to make it through the night. You know the saying, "What makes you cum, makes you stronger." Just try not to have TOO much kinky fun.

  • Bondage, sex, transformation, hypnosis, and impregnation! Get battle fucked like you've never been before. The fun doesn't end after combat, many status effects persist and affect how the denizens of the domains react to Lisa! After all, it's difficult to talk to people while gagged or to read with a blindfold.

  • Embrace the power of the Lust Knight in both day and night! During the day, Lisa can do various things to raise her stats. At night, she fights with her Lust Knight powers. While cumming too much can end the night early, there are many benefits to cumming too!

  • Customize your gear to change your BATTLE DICE! When Lisa attacks, she rolls to power up her skills. Find dice faces to customize your luck but be warned, those kinky status effects could change what you roll, and not for your benefit!

  • The world is full of choices! Think carefully about how you answer questions and make decisions, because they can have very real consequences in the domain at night. Fortunately for Lisa, there is often more than one way to solve a problem!

  • Twelve twisted areas to explore, divided by four themed domains. Traverse the domains of Order, Perception, Fertility, and Willpower to experience environments ranging from an eerie suburban cul-de-sac to a demonic palace of gold.

  • Will you play along with the perverse schemes of the Aspects, or will you fight the power and rebel at every moment? The levels themselves alter their behavior based on how Lisa behaves. Rebellion might close off some opportunities, but open up others. How you play is not "good" or "bad," it's just different.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or Left Mouse Click - Move  

Enter or Z or Left Mouse Click - Confirm

Esc or X or Right Mouse Click - Cancel or Menu (Outside of Battle)

Shift Key (Hold) - Sprint/Move Fast

Tab Key (Hold) - Skip Dialogue 

 

Let's promote sex positivity and stay kinky, now more than ever!

content_descriptors.notes:
Lust Knight Lisa contains explicit sexual acts that can be considered consensual, dubiously consensual, and/or non-consensual depending on the interaction and situation. The player character, Lisa, will be bound, transformed, fucked, and groped both in and out of combat by various foes and NPCs.

Additionally, losing in combat on specific nights will result in a sexually explicit scene with descriptive text and a full screen image.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 644 MB available space

short_description: Your chaos will be chained by humanity’s bond of desire! Office worker by day, Lust Knight by Night! Slay foes and explore bizarre domains while being bound, fucked, transformed, and hypnotized in this fetish RPG as you discover the consequences of your earlier, seemingly arbitrary, decisions!
